text: archie gestern um 13:30 Uhr Speaking if vim keys, | am realling digging binding Capslock+hjkl globally. it is so nice to have these keys in every menu consistently every where 1 S | dont use x key so | unmapped it and use it as a prefix. | think it is much better way yo bind extra keys relative to F keys (gearbeitet) I recently found out about byobu. Which is a wrapper for tmux with nice default config. It uses F keys for passing commands to tmux, which | find very interesting for a keyboard centeric app
